author: Simon Difford
description: Daiquiris are refreshing but I believe this mastiha and birch water influenced example is particularly so.
name: Eccentrica Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
